name: Not present
description:
: It's a simple game with minimalistic mechanism. I'm a developer and the game as almost no code, so most of the effort were on everything else. It forced me to learn camera, design and UI skills.

Challenge achieved : Extra Meme (Beach Ball) / Extra Switcheroo (somehow)

Credits and thanks : Free3d.com for the chairs, Google image for the ugly sweater, UltimateGameMusicCollection (assetstore) for the intro music, and special thanks to the community on Discord!

Team of one : Hito on Discord, I play with unity on weekends for 3 years now, this is my first Jam. I'm a web developer for 14 years, I've found out making games could be as fun as playing them.

Improvements : The game could definitely use better assets, and other way of mixing kids, like hats, faces, shapes… A better sound design would also be a huge plus. It makes me want to make the next jam in a team.

OpenSource : I will upload the source of the game which I commented, maybe it will help. Anyway, I like to code thinking I could be judge by others, this force me to excellence.
